item.title: 508 Spammer!
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

How do i stop spammers from entering my server!!!
a spammer guys ip- 83.84.102.109
please block him!!! and tell me how to block him please!!!
when too many people log in from one ip… how can i stop it???
like in runserver it says “Flooding - Banning Host - 83.84.102.109”[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 21, 2009, 04:24:41 pm[/size][hr]Please Guys i been asking this for many weeks and no answer!!! Thanks You![br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 21, 2009, 04:26:43 pm[/size][hr]508 command doesn’t work!!! ipban doesn’t work!!! well it works but with a bug! they are simply able to log back in!! without any interuption![br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 21, 2009, 04:28:02 pm[/size][hr]Current Code in Command.java
if (p.rights >= 2) {

		if (cmd[0].equals("ipban")) {
			String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1));
			Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)];
			String host = Server.socketListener.getAddress(p2.socket.socket);
			if (p2 != null) {
				p2.getActionSender().logout(p2);
				p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "The player " + p2.username + " has been ipbanned.");
				p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "No more connections may come from " +host);
				p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
				SocketListener.loadBannedHosts();
			}

Read full topic
